Sentece: Compared to tapentadol IR 86 mg, the prolonged-release characteristics of tapentadol PR 86 mg were evident with a lower Cmax (22.5 ng/ml vs. 64.2 ng/ml), a longer time to Cmax (5.0 h vs. 1.5 h), a higher half-value duration (HVD: 12.5 h vs. 3.6 h), and a longer mean residence time (MRT: 10.6 h vs. 6.0 h).
